heading: HB03860
0: AN ACT PRESERVING THE INDIGENOUS GAMES OF THE PHILIPPINES
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2020-03-10, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-03-11 and received by the Senate on 2020-03-11 Substituted by HB06192
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03860
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PRESERVING THE INDIGENOUS GAMES OF THE PHILIPPINES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : AGABAS, TYRONE D.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-13
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Crisologo (000 2019-11-20)2. Barba (000 2019-11-20)
3. Villanueva (E.) (000 2020-02-17)4. Rivera (000 2020-02-17)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-13
          -The body approved HB No. 3860 with amendments
          -Initial deliberation of HB No. 3860(Preserving the Indigenous Games)
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2019-12-17
          -Consideration and Approval of Substitute Bill and Committee Report of Measure which seeks to preserve the indigenous games of the Philippines
      3. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2019-12-18
      4. Committee Report filed on 2020-02-05
          -Committee Report No.218 on HB No. 6192
      5. Referred the Committee Report to the Committee on Rules (OB) on 2020-02-05
      6. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2020-02-05
      7. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-02-26
          -Committee Report No. 06192 on HB No. 00218, substituting HB No. 03860 was approved on Second Reading
      8. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-03-10
          -Committee Report No. 00218 of HB No. 06192 in substitution of HB No. 03860 was approved on Third Reading.
      9. Other Action by the Committee on Rules on 2020-03-11
          -Committee Report No. 00218 of HB No. 06192 in substitution of HB No. 03860 was transmitted to the Senate and received by the Senate on the same date
MOTHER BILL: HB06192
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-08-20
